scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 1 --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy-with-salt:rinkeby: ./salt.sh && npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 2 --to 2 --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 1 --network goerli
scripts.deploy-with-salt:goerli: ./salt.sh && npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 2 --to 2 --network goerli
scripts.deploy:sepolia: npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 1 --to 1 --network sepolia
scripts.deploy-with-salt:sepolia: ./salt.sh && npm run compile && truffle migrate --f 2 --to 2 --network sepolia
